channel.title: CVE Feed for Trellix -- Trellix Agent

item.title: CVE-2022-3859|2024-08-03T01:20:58.790Z -- trellix -- trellix%20agent
item.description: An uncontrolled search path vulnerability exists in Trellix Agent (TA) for Windows in versions prior to 5.7.8. This allows an attacker with admin access, which is required to place the DLL in the restricted Windows System folder, to elevate their privileges to System by placing a malicious DLL there.
